CreateChannel.name: CreateChannel
CreateChannel.description: Grants permission to create a channel in AWS Elemental MediaPackage.

CreateHarvestJob.name: CreateHarvestJob
CreateHarvestJob.description: Grants permission to create a harvest job in AWS Elemental MediaPackage.

CreateOriginEndpoint.name: CreateOriginEndpoint
CreateOriginEndpoint.description: Grants permission to create an endpoint in AWS Elemental MediaPackage.

DeleteChannel.name: DeleteChannel
DeleteChannel.description: Grants permission to delete a channel in AWS Elemental MediaPackage.

DeleteOriginEndpoint.name: DeleteOriginEndpoint
DeleteOriginEndpoint.description: Grants permission to delete an endpoint in AWS Elemental MediaPackage.

DescribeChannel.name: DescribeChannel
DescribeChannel.description: Grants permission to view the details of a channel in AWS Elemental MediaPackage.

DescribeHarvestJob.name: DescribeHarvestJob
DescribeHarvestJob.description: Grants permission to view the details of a harvest job in AWS Elemental MediaPackage.

DescribeOriginEndpoint.name: DescribeOriginEndpoint
DescribeOriginEndpoint.description: Grants permission to view the details of an endpoint in AWS Elemental MediaPackage.

ListChannels.name: ListChannels
ListChannels.description: Grants permission to view a list of channels in AWS Elemental MediaPackage.

ListHarvestJobs.name: ListHarvestJobs
ListHarvestJobs.description: Grants permission to view a list of harvest jobs in AWS Elemental MediaPackage.

ListOriginEndpoints.name: ListOriginEndpoints
ListOriginEndpoints.description: Grants permission to view a list of endpoints in AWS Elemental MediaPackage.

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list the tags assigned to a Channel or OriginEndpoint.

RotateChannelCredentials.name: RotateChannelCredentials
RotateChannelCredentials.description:
Grants permission to rotate credentials for the first IngestEndpoint of a Channel
                                                in AWS Elemental MediaPackage.

RotateIngestEndpointCredentials.name: RotateIngestEndpointCredentials
RotateIngestEndpointCredentials.description:
Grants permission to rotate IngestEndpoint credentials for a Channel in AWS Elemental
                                                MediaPackage.

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to delete tags to a Channel or OriginEndpoint.

UpdateChannel.name: UpdateChannel
UpdateChannel.description: Grants permission to make changes to a channel in AWS Elemental MediaPackage.

UpdateOriginEndpoint.name: UpdateOriginEndpoint
UpdateOriginEndpoint.description: Grants permission to make changes to an endpoint in AWS Elemental MediaPackage.
